feed.title: SAP Community - SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central
feed.subtitle: SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Create a report in SAP SuccessFactors Employee central for Individual Contributor
entry.content:
Hello,

We want to create a report in SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central which provides data of Employees who are Individual Contributors i.e. do not have any direct reportees or are the last node in hierarchy.

We have created a report to fetch the entire hierarchy of a selected Manager but are not able to fetch the last employee of the hierarchy via reporting. 

Looking for some suggestions.

Regards,

Hinal Deriya

entry.title: Leave accrual based on working days i previous year
entry.content:
Hi @Volker_Ruof / @StephanieCR  / experts / product owners,

We are busy exploring a configuration scenario where the annual leave entitlement is determined by the number of working days in the previous year.

A working day is defined as:

  • A normal working day

  • Working on a non-working day

  • More than 4 hours of overtime booked in a day

  • Absence due to a work accident, strike, etc.
    (There are a few other basic conditions, but these are the main ones.)

The working day checks have been achieved using time valuations, which add to a counter in a time collector. This correctly calculates the number of working days.

The accrual period and account validity are based on the employee’s hire date. For example, the number of working days from 1 June 2024 to 31 May 2025 determines the entitlement for 1 June 2025.

This would have been straightforward if all employees shared the same accrual period, as we could use a flexible-period time collector. However, because the period differs per employee (based on hire date), this becomes more complex.

We are currently considering two possible approaches and would appreciate your feedback or alternative suggestions:

Scenario 1:
Leverage a workaround within the decision or calculation rule (details can be shared privately with product owners or experts) to manipulate or assign values to the time valuation/time type group, thereby determining working days for the relevant annual period.

Scenario 2:
Use a daily time collector that writes to a custom object. The accrual rule would then read the value from this custom object, populated via an onSave rule in the timesheet or time type groups.
The downside is potential performance issues, and it would not automatically capture retrospective timesheet changes unless the timesheet is re-saved.

Would love to hear your thoughts, feedback or alternative approaches.

Thank you!

 

SAP SuccessFactors Time Tracking

entry.title: How to reference child object in another custom MDF object
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I noticed an error message when I try to reference child object in another custom MDF object

You have used object cust_ChildObject as the valid value source for field cust_FieldName. The effective dating of object cust_ChildObject is set to “From Parent”. This will lead to errors in accessing quickcards and many other issues. Please remove the field reference.

Therefore, is there another way to reference the child object from the parent object in another custom MDF object? Basically getting the information of the child object of another parent object.

Thank you.

entry.title: Want to learn My Integration - SAP SF EC. Please suggest some link or documentation.
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m interested in learning about SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central (EC) Integration — specifically, how integrations are structured and implemented (e.g., API, CPI, Integration Center, etc.).

Could anyone please suggest official documentation, learning materials, or community tutorials that would help me get started?
Any practical examples or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: Best Practices for employees on extended notice periods
entry.content:
What is the common practice among companies that have offices in Europe, where employees are on extended notice periods due to legal requirements?

Specifically, in situations where companies are unable to deactivate their profiles in internal systems, is it standard to restrict or deactivate their access to company systems during this period?

entry.title: How to identify all integrations in SuccessFactors that use SFAPI / SOAP?
entry.content:
Hi Experts

Please let me know how I can identify all integrations in SuccessFactors that use SFAPI / SOAP.

I have heard that SAP is deprecating SFAPI / SOAP based integration methods in SuccessFactors.

To switch to new integration methods, I first need to know all the integrations currently running in SuccessFactors that use SFAPI / SOAP.

Thank you

Arul

entry.title: Absence Reporting Success Factors Across Countries with Role-Based Access (via Story)
entry.content:
Hello, we are looking for a reporting solution within SuccessFactors that allows us to easily analyze employee absences. Ideally, we would like to configure the report so that it is accessible to all countries, while ensuring that each user can only view data relevant to their own country based on permission settings.

Is there a recommended approach or best practice to achieve this setup? Any guidance or examples would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: Analytic Cards on the Latest Home Page
entry.content:
Hi
Is there any comprehensive documentation available for the "Analytic Cards" feature on the Latest Home Page introduced in the 2H 2025 SuccessFactors release? Specifically, I'm looking for details related to the "Upcoming Absence" card.
Regards
Monisha

entry.title: Export data for Job Families not showing all fields
entry.content:
Hi SAP,

Hope you are well. when extracting data using import/export data the job families is only showing 1 family, i even attempted to use report stories to generate all fields and nothing. can you please assist with generating the rest of the fields, this is to ensure that i am able to pull a report that will show both job roles and family data

entry.title: Employee replication with inactive cost center assignment
entry.content:
Currently we have implemented Org and Employee replication from SuccessFactors to S/4 Hana mini master.  We had a company restructure and during that restructure the finance department has locked all their old cost centers as of 01/01/1900.  Now when replication occurs on rehires the s/4 system errors out saying

Cost center 1000/50004309 blocked against direct postings on 02/14/2023

I asked for finance to utilize validity periods for their cost centers, for our company that is not currently an option. This occurs in both SFEC and S4 (cost centers are passed to SFEC from S4 with the inactivation date of 01/01/1900 when locked)

1- Is there a work around, BADI, anything I can do on the HR side to stop the errors and complete replication for positions and employees in S4?

2- Are there any options in SuccessFactors to be able to edit on retro entries in job portlet with inactive cost centers.

Thank you for any advice.

entry.content:

I am interested in Employee Central, Recruiting and Onboarding modules. 

Regards

Arul

entry.title: Leave accrual in EC Time Off and Time TT based on the employee’s number of present Days
entry.content: How can we configure leave accrual in Employee Central Time Off and Time Tracking based on the employee’s number of present days? For example, employees with 240 present days earn 12 ELs, 250 present days earn 13 ELs, 270 present days earn 14 ELs, and 290 present days earn 15 ELs within a calendar year. Additionally, we require a report showing each employee’s total present days.

entry.title: Where is the data for sap successfactors latest home page Analytic cards?
entry.content:
Where is the Data for the Sap Successfactors / latest home page / Analytic card / Upcoming Leaves and Absences managed?

Is there a page where i can change it or do i have to create a report in the reporting area? How do i connect that with the card?

All the Changes that are possible in Manage home page don´t say something about the data.

Its not explained in any Knowledge Base. Please fix this now SAP!!!

entry.title: 2H 2025- Automatic Holiday recalculation.
entry.content:
In the latest 2H 2025 release, an automatic holiday calendar update feature has been introduced.
Despite having the configurations set up correctly, certain scenarios are still not functioning as expected. For instance, when the start and end dates of a leave request fall on the same holiday, the leave is not being cancelled automatically.

Could you please advise if there are any additional configuration steps required or alternative approaches to resolve this issue?

entry.title: Job Profile URL on Latest People Profile User Card
entry.content:
Hello,

In the Latest People profile, I was able to enable the Job Profile hyperlink  in the team member's profile card for Employee View of Others role. However, when I add the same permissions to Employee View of Self role, the hyperlink is not present. I've followed KBAs to enable and compared the permissions of the two roles.

Is it normal behavior of the system that an employee cannot view their own job profile in their own user card?

entry.content:
Hello all, 

I am wondering how others are using document generation in EC?  We are considering using it for promotion/transfer offer letters.  Is anyone using document generation for these types of offer letters?

entry.title: How to create business rule to restrict the period for editing the Payment Information?
entry.content:
Hi All,

I would like to create a business rule for Payent information.

Any time a user edits the payment information between the 15th of current month and the 1st of next month an error message should come up that this is not possible.

Thank you for the ideas.

 

Szilvia

entry.title: ECT-254765 - Enhanced Error Validation and Visibility for Termination Rollback Scenarios
entry.content:
Hello All,

As per ECT-254765 - Enhancements in Hire, Rehire, Termination, Global Assignment, and Concurrent Employment, 

There is validation error added for termination (Enhanced Error Validation and Visibility for Termination Rollback Scenarios). Does anyone knows how we can replicate this error? what incorrect data will produce this error?

Many thanks

Lalitha
